description:
Slade had done a scene the day before we shot this.
He worked with one of the first-timer straight guys- showing him the ropes. The guy was pretty nervous and basically Slade did all the work with not much reciprocation.
I was driving him back to his hotel and he said he was still pretty horny and really wanted to be serviced.
Obviously a hint, and since we had most of the next day free, I figured why not? It be fun to suck his big dick and work with a gay guy who really would be in to it.
This one was fun,as he was all writhing around. He loves getting rimmed as much as doing it.
Got some cool close up shots in this one. Makes ya feel like your jerkin-em-off yourself.
title: Bryan & Slade - Serviced
